DOC.brief_summary: The aim study explore premeal protein-enriched bar effect postprandial glucose level concentration plasma incretin hormone [ glucagon-like peptide 1 ( GLP-1 ) and/or glucose-dependent insulinotropic polypeptide ( GIP ) ] healthy subject type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Premeal Consumption Protein-enriched Bar Blood Glucose Level Secretion Hormones
DOC.detailed_description: Fifteen healthy subject fifteen subject type 2 diabetes treat diet and/or metformin , SU , DPP4 inhibitor recruit . Every subject study 2 separate day random order 1-2 week interval . These participant consume protein enrich bar follow standardized high-glycemic-index breakfast hospital set breakfast follow protein enriched bar cross-over fashion . Blood sample do moment start breakfast ( 0 min ) 10 , 20 , 30 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 150 , 180 min . Plasma glucose level , total/active GLP-1 , GIP , insulin , C-peptide , glucagon measure . Incremental area curve ( iAUC ) glucose level hormone 0 min 180 min calculate .
DOC.criteria: BMI 18.5~35 kg/m2 Healthy volunteer : never diagnose diabetes fast plasma glucose < =100mg/dl HbA1c < 6.0 % participant diabetes diagnosed diabetes treat diet , HbA1c 6.0~9.0 % treat metformin SU , HbA1c 6.0~10.0 % treat DPP4 inhibitor HbA1c 6.0~9.0 % Those diagnose Type 1 diabetes History DKA History insulin therapy Allergy wheat , flour , nut , milk Pregnancy/lactation AST ALT > 2.5 time upper normal reference range eGFR < 30 mL/min/1.73m2 Hb < 10g/dl History GI surgery ( except hemorrhoidectomy , appendectomy )
